entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation, mentioned as 'us' and 'we'. He has seen Voldemort and Sirius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's, who is trying to make sense of the situation. She is mentioned as 'us' and 'we'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's, who has a hushed voice and suggests that Sirius's brother might have told him the secret.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone Voldemort wants to use to get a weapon. He has a brother who was a Death Eater.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist, who wants to use Sirius to get a weapon.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who has been keeping Sirius locked up.

relationships.description: Harry has seen Voldemort and Sirius, which is why he thinks they are there.
Ron speculates that Sirius's brother might have told him the secret of how to get the weapon.
Dumbledore has been keeping Sirius locked up, which is why Ron thinks it might be related to Voldemort's plan.
